name: @er1c/chronomouse
description: These package was forked from original project Chronomouse.js

scripts.build-new-version: rm -f chronomouse.$(npm run version:extract --silent).min.js && npm run version:bump --silent && npm run minifyJS --silent
scripts.version:extract: cat package.json | grep version | head -1 | awk -F: '{ print $2 }' | sed 's/[,]//g' | tr -d '[[:space:]]' | tr -d "\""
